QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT CAST(RIGHT([Member ID], LEN([Member ID]) - 1) AS BIGINT) AS person_id, CAST(RIGHT([Claim ID], LEN([Claim ID]) - 1) AS BIGINT) AS visit_occurrence_id, [Date of procedure] AS procedure_date, CASE WHEN [Type of claim] = 'out-patient' THEN 38000215 ELSE 38000184 END AS procedure_type_concept_id, CAST('1' + RIGHT([Institution ID], LEN([Institution ID]) - 1) AS BIGINT) AS associated_provider_id, [ICD9CM_level1] AS procedure_source_value, [Actual point] * 10 AS total_paid FROM {sc}.[Procedure] p JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND p.[Member ID] = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE
